title: Black Bean and Quinoa Chili Bowl
directions: Sauté onion and bell pepper in skillet with olive oil over medium heat for 5 minutes or until onion is soft and translucent. /p Add garlic, good additional 30 seconds until golden and fragrant. /p Stir in stock, diced tomatoes with juice, quinoa, salt, chili powder, cumin, and cayenne. /p Simmer over medium heat until quinoa softens, about 20 minutes. /p Add corn kernels and black beans. Cook for additional 5 minutes, stirring occasionally, until cooked through. /p Serving Size: 1/6 of total yield /p Calories 281
